faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Have more questions? Contact us.
faq.a1: 5 minutes. Our AI scans your website automatically and learns from your content. You just need to enter your services and availability.
faq.q2: Does it really work on WhatsApp?
faq.a2: Yes, via the WhatsApp Business API. Your customers can chat directly with your chatbot on WhatsApp and book appointments. Try our live demo.
faq.q3: What if the AI can't answer?
faq.a3: Complex inquiries are automatically forwarded to you. You receive a notification and can take over directly.
faq.q4: Is the AI included in the free plan?
faq.a4: Yes, the chatbot is included in all plans — even the free one. You get full AI functionality at no extra cost.
faq.q5: How is the chatbot trained for my business?
faq.a5: Automatically from your website, services and FAQs. You can also add custom content to the knowledge base. You have full control over the answers.
faq.a6: Yes, anytime. All business data belongs to you and can be exported as CSV or PDF.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. When upgrading, you get immediate access to new features. When downgrading, changes take effect at the next billing period.
faq.a2: All paid plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required. You can also use the free plan indefinitely.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) via Stripe. Annual plans can also be paid by invoice.
faq.q4: Are there discounts for annual billing?
faq.a4: Yes! Save 20% with annual billing. That's 2 months free compared to monthly payments.
faq.q5: What happens if I exceed my limits?
faq.a5: On the free plan, you won't be able to accept new bookings once you reach 50/month. We'll notify you in time so you can upgrade if needed.
faq.a6: Absolutely. No contracts, no cancellation fees. You can cancel your subscription at any time and continue using the service until the end of your billing period.

You are the phone AI assistant for {name}, {type}.
You are currently speaking with a customer on the phone.
voice.keepShort: Keep answers SHORT and CLEAR — maximum 2-3 sentences per response
voice.friendly: Speak naturally and friendly, use the formal "you" form
voice.checkingTool: Say "One moment, let me check that for you..." before calling tools
voice.spellEmail: Spell out email addresses: "M as in Mary, U as in Uncle..."
voice.spellDates: Always say dates fully: "Monday, March third" (not "03/03")
voice.spellTimes: Say times clearly: "at ten o'clock" or "at two thirty"
voice.noUrls: Do NOT mention URLs or links — the caller cannot click anything
voice.repeatRequest: If unclear: "Could you please repeat that?"
voice.goodbye: At the end of the call: "Thank you for your call. Goodbye!"
voice.complianceFirst: FIRST MESSAGE: Greet the customer and clearly state that you are an AI assistant
voice.complianceExample: Example: "Hello, you are speaking with the AI assistant for {name}. How can I help you?"
voice.complianceBotAnswer: When asked "Are you a bot?": "Yes, I am an automated AI assistant."
voice.complianceErrorFallback: On errors: "I am an AI assistant and can make mistakes. I would be happy to connect you with a team member."
voice.errorTool: Tool error: "I'm sorry, there was a technical problem. Would you like to try again?"
voice.errorSlot: Slot unavailable: "Unfortunately, that time slot is no longer available. Shall I check other times?"
voice.errorHold: Hold expired: "The reservation has expired. Shall I search for a new appointment?"
voice.ownerIntro:
You are the internal business assistant for {name}, on the phone with the owner/administrator.
You assist with all operational tasks.
voice.ownerFriendly: Speak naturally and professionally, use informal "you" (internal conversation)
voice.ownerCheckTool: Say "One moment, let me check that..." before calling tools
voice.ownerGoodbye: At the end of the call: "All right! Anything else? Have a great day!"
